Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory18.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'War zone 049, landing successful!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The viral density is so high here, hmm... Oh, the density differs from layer to layer...? Lower layer's pretty low... I wonder what that layer's for?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Giant tunnel found! Wow, it's so long! Hahaha, Nanami knows what this is! It must be the transportation of early humans!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hello there! Anybody home?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hmm... The viral density is low underground, but the signals are all blocked off. Even Corrupted detection's gone all wonky.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory73.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Right! Commandant said that we need to make mission records! Um, let's see... no Constructs, no parts that resemble Construct remains...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Record: Clean as a whistle!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{3: 'Nanami skates around the tunnel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Okay! The tunnel's all checked out, it's time to go up!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Don't go up! Where did you come from?! The virus is strong up there during daytime!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Girl', 3: "...Wait... No, you're a... Construct?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ding ding ding! A live human found!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Why are you running away?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Human Girl', 3: '...Go away.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey, why do you want Nanami away?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Right, Commandant said that making new friends is a good thing! Are you mad because we aren't friends yet? Then let's be friends!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: "Amy, it's time to go back!"}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "Not much of a haul... but it's turning night soon and it's going to be dangerous."}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: 'Huh, this is...?'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'A Construct...?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Just a passing through Construct, Nanami... from Babylonia!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: '...Babylonia? Just you...?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The one and only child of the sun! Na—na—mi!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'Ah...'}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "That's trouble. When night falls in City 049, that's when all the Corrupted come out. Are you on a mission? Can you prolong it?"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yep yep! Nanami's here to find out what happened to the lost Constructs!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I can... but Nanami would like to finish this mission soon and go see Commandant instead...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: "Lost Constructs? You've seen the place. We've almost scoured the entirety of it, and there's not a thing that can move but you."}
{2: 'Scavenger B', 3: 'When did they go missing? There might be somebody else that saw them... If there are strange happenings, people would report it to our leader, so maybe you can...'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'Hey... leader!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "Leader! We found a friend from Babylonia! She's a Construct!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger B', 3: "She's looking into something about missing Constructs, leader, can we help her out?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amy', 3: "The sensor's saying that viral density is rising nearby, we should...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "How's your haul today?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger A', 3: 'Leader, we...'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'This area.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'This place is already dead. Not a single ammo shell, not even waste metal. Even scavengers cannot survive on this barren land.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'City 049 is dangerous at night. The Corrupted come in groups and the darkness covers their trails.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "Even if you're a Construct, you won't stand a chance at night.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "I'm Garrison, the leader of the scavengers here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'If we are new friends, then...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "We'd help you investigate, but to find any information on this will take us time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'Before we have any results, we will provide for anything you might need.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "The sun's setting. Time to go back to camp.", 4: '2'}
